location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Index to Place Names on Degree Sheets. (1st Series of Additions - August 1917)'

physicalDescription.extent: The index is arranged in alphabetical order.

Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the inside back cover with 17; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.Pagination: the volume also contains an original printed pagination sequence.

mods.abstract: The volume, marked confidential, is Index to Place Names on Degree Sheets. (1st Series of Additions - August 1917), prepared at the General Staff Branch, Army Headquarters, India. The volume is an index of place names with reference to the Survey of India degree sheets upon which each place can be found, along with a grid reference. On the front cover is a note on the reference system and a list of the degree sheets that the index covers.
